pkgmetadata.longdescription: El Nino/Southern Oscillation (ENSO) Index // Downloads Southern Oscillation Index from https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/teleconnections/enso/indicators/soi/ and Oceanic Nino Index data from http://www.cpc.ncep.noaa.gov/p roducts/analysis_monitoring/ensostuff/detrend.nino34.ascii.txt.
